You incorporate restorative reagents into some of your works.

Full Description

Whenever a creature drinks an @Compendium[5e-complete-fr.5e-class-features.L5Dfgrnus0p4Tdyq]{Experimental Elixir} you created, the creature gains temporary hit points equal to 2d6 + your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1 temporary hit point).

You can cast @Compendium[5e-complete-fr.5e-spells.wj6AbH9KtGhSigMy]{Lesser Restoration} without expending a spell slot and without preparing the spell, provided you use @Compendium[5e-complete-fr.5e-items.JK0OX6MAQvfpdSAw]{Alchemist's Supplies} as the spellcasting focus. You can do so a number of times equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Note: Roll this feature for the extra healing benefits.

After adding Lesser Restoration to your character, set Preparation Mode to Innate Spell casting, with uses set to @abilities.int.mod per Long Rest.
